items.summary: Update the UserRole enum in backend/access-control.mo to include #superadmin variant alongside existing role variants

Modify the isAdmin function in backend/access-control.mo to return true when the user role is either #admin or #superadmin, using pattern: let role = getUserRole(state, caller); return role == #admin or role == #superadmin;

Implement state synchronization mechanism in backend to ensure Superadmin Principal is correctly assigned #superadmin role in AccessControlState, either through a dedicated force-update function or by bypassing isAdmin check in assignRole when caller is Superadmin from the main.mo role system
